macro_context.fed_outlook: Patient stance, data-dependent, 2 potential cuts priced for 2026, new chair Kevin Warsh nomination May 2026
macro_context.dxy_trend: Resilient around 97.6, showing inverse correlation with BTC
key_macro_events: Fed balance sheet expansion via T-bill purchases

onchain_signals.whale_accumulation: Mixed - 66,940 BTC moved to accumulation wallets Feb 6, but large holders (1K-10K BTC) reduced by 220K BTC over past year
onchain_signals.miner_behavior: Production costs ~$77,000, some margin compression, hash rate showing network consolidation
key_onchain_insights: UTXO count at 166.6M lowest since April 2024

regulatory_update.us_regulation: Major progress - SEC approved generic listing standards for crypto ETFs, accelerating timelines from 240 to 75 days. Paul Atkins launched Project Crypto and token taxonomy initiative
regulatory_update.global_regulation: EU MiCA framework active, UK developing stablecoin regime, Singapore MAS standards, UAE guidelines, Brazil/Kyrgyzstan Bitcoin reserve legislation passed

institutional_views.key_argument: ETF inflows offset by DAT buying slowdown, but regulatory clarity supports institutional adoption
Undervalued vs gold on volatility-adjusted basis, tokenization wave, debasement trade
Elongated cycle driven by institutional capital, breaking traditional 4-year pattern
Regulatory clarity driving institutional adoption, constructive rate environment
Year off in four-year cycle, expects consolidation before next leg up

pessimiste.context: Macro headwinds intensify avec Fed hawkish pivot, regulatory pushback, et institutional selling cascade
pessimiste.narrative: Le cycle de 4 ans reprend le dessus avec bear market traditionnel. ETF outflows s'accélèrent, liquidité globale se contracte, corrélation avec équities augmente. Capitulation finale des long-term holders avant cycle suivant en 2028-2029.

neutre.context: Consolidation prolongée avec volatilité réduite, institutional adoption steady mais pas explosive
neutre.narrative: Bitcoin entre dans phase de maturation avec volatilité décroissante. ETFs stabilisent flows, institutional adoption continue graduellement. Support technique solide autour $70K. Range trading extended avant breakout structurel fin 2026.

optimiste.context: Super cycle confirmé avec institutional FOMO, regulatory breakthrough, et monetary debasement acceleration
optimiste.narrative: Bitcoin breaks 4-year cycle définitivement. Massive institutional allocation via ETFs, sovereign adoption accelerates, Fed dovish pivot stimulates risk assets. New paradigm de store of value digital confirmé avec multiple expansion permanent.

consensus.market_sentiment: Extreme fear domine mais whale accumulation suggère potential bottom formation. Institutional views remain constructively bullish long-term
consensus.key_debate: Traditional 4-year cycle vs institutional super-cycle - est-ce que ETFs et adoption institutionnelle changent fondamentalement la dynamique cyclique de Bitcoin?

downside.description: Taux plus élevés plus longtemps que prévu

upside.description: Aggressive rate cuts stimulate risk assets

weekly_summary: Bitcoin traverse une phase de extreme fear avec Fear & Greed Index à 8, le plus bas depuis COVID-19. Whales accumulent massivement malgré le selloff, avec 66,940 BTC déplacés vers accumulation wallets. ETF outflows continuent (-693M$ en février) mais regulatory clarity s'améliore avec SEC generic listing standards. Institutional consensus reste bullish $120K-$175K end-2026 malgré near-term weakness.

changelog.message: Première analyse — pas de comparaison disponible.
